about.label: About Us
about.title: About
about.intro: The AI and Beyond was born from Leonardo Sarti Magi's experience: an AI consultant and software developer with a direct approach to solving real problems.
about.paragraph1: But The AI and Beyond is not a single person. It's a structure designed to be lean, fast, and precise — where human expertise and AI tools work together on every project.
about.paragraph2: When you work with us, you're not working with a freelancer doing everything alone. You're working with a system where every analysis, every automation, every deliverable goes through AI tools that we ourselves use every day. It's our way of proving AI works: we use it before recommending it.
about.paragraph3: Our starting point is always the same: where are you losing time, money, or control over a process? From there, we figure out if AI is the right answer. Sometimes it is. Sometimes it's not. Either way, you have a clear picture before a single line of code is written.
about.paragraph4: We've worked on systems where errors are costly: industrial maintenance, regulatory compliance, business-critical applications. This taught us one thing: technology that works is technology that disappears from daily life — no one has to think about it.

services.label: Services
services.title: What we
services.description: We don't build a single thing. We optimize how you work. With tools that already exist, or with tools designed just for you.
services.bridge: These aren't off-the-shelf services. They're the ways we solve the problems businesses bring us every day. Small or large. One person or a hundred.

consulting.title: AI Strategy
consulting.description: A clear map of where AI makes a difference in your processes
consulting.problem: You know AI could help. But you don't know where to start. And every vendor promises revolutions without telling you what actually makes sense for your case.
consulting.outcome: You have a clear map. You know where AI makes a difference in your processes, which tools you need, and which you don't. No blind investments.
consulting.different: We start from the inefficiency you see every day — and verify if AI is the solution or if something else is needed. Even if the answer is "no AI." Building the wrong thing is a waste for everyone.

webdev.title: Custom Development
webdev.description: Tools built around how your team actually works
webdev.problem: Your team works with tools that weren't designed for your workflow. You adapt to the software. Workarounds, parallel spreadsheets, manual steps that exist only because the system won't allow otherwise.
webdev.outcome: You have a tool built around how your team actually works. Manual steps disappear. The workflow is the right one for you.
webdev.different: We don't develop generic software. We start from your process, understand it, and build something that makes it simpler. If a process already works well, we don't intervene.

agents.title: Intelligent Automation
agents.description: AI agents that handle repetitive tasks autonomously
agents.problem: Your team spends hours every week on repetitive tasks. Data entry, email sorting, reports, follow-ups. Necessary activities, but ones that don't require human expertise.
agents.outcome: An AI agent handles these activities autonomously. Your team only intervenes on exceptions — where the system doesn't have enough context to decide on its own. Low-value work disappears from the day.
agents.different: We're not talking about simple auto-reply bots. We're talking about agents that work: they receive emails, classify them, extract data into your management system, respond to clients, and only notify exceptions. They integrate with your tools — CRM, email, management systems — and work even when no one is watching.

prototypes.title: Rapid Validation
prototypes.description: Working MVP in 3-4 weeks to validate your idea
prototypes.problem: You have an idea for a product or process. But investing months of development before knowing if it works is a risk you don't want to take.
prototypes.outcome: In 3-4 weeks you have a working MVP — not polished, but enough to answer the real question. Real feedback from real users. You decide the next step with data, not assumptions.
prototypes.different: We optimize for speed of learning, not quantity of features. A prototype must answer one question: "Does this thing work?" The faster you get to the answer, the less you risk.

pm.title: Operational Optimization
pm.description: AI tools integrated into your workflow to eliminate manual coordination
pm.problem: Coordination steals time you should dedicate to real work. Status updates, resource reallocation, weekly reports — all manual, all repetitive.
pm.outcome: AI tools integrated into your workflow automate coordination. Automatic reports, smart alerts, real-time visibility. Without asking anyone "where are we at?"
pm.different: We don't replace your tools. We make them smarter. We work with what you already use — Notion, Jira, Linear, Asana — and add a layer of automation that eliminates the mechanical part.

datalens.title: DataLens — Analytics Dashboard
datalens.problem: The company managed KPIs spread across 4 different Excel sheets. Every Monday, the manager spent 2 hours compiling an aggregated report.
datalens.solution: Custom web dashboard, powered by business APIs and Google Sheets. Real-time data updates, with interactive charts and automatic alerts when a KPI drops below threshold.

nis2.title: NIS2 Compliance Dashboard
nis2.problem: A company subject to the NIS2 directive had no visibility on the compliance status of its departments. Every audit was a manual exercise.
nis2.solution: Interactive dashboard with modules for each NIS2 requirement, department compliance status, timelines, attached documentation. An AI layer suggests priorities and critical gaps.

rituale.title: Rituale — Brand Website
rituale.problem: A wellness brand needed an online presence that communicated quality, care, identity — not a generic template.
rituale.solution: Custom website with emotional design, curated copy, structure optimized for conversion and SEO.

process.label: How We Work
process.title: A transparent
process.description: From the first call to delivery, here's how we work.
process.closingNote: Every project is different. Timelines and phases adapt to the complexity of the problem — not to a template.

listen.title: We Listen
listen.description: First, we understand the context. We talk to those who work, not just those who decide. We map processes, identify bottlenecks, and define objectives together.

analyze.title: We Analyze
analyze.description: We study the data, workflows, and tools already in use. We assess where AI can have real impact and where it can't. Not everything needs artificial intelligence.

design.title: We Design
design.description: We define architecture, tools, timelines and costs. No surprises: you know exactly what will be built and why.

develop.title: We Build
develop.description: We build with agile methodology. Continuous feedback, rapid iterations, zero black-box effect. You see the progress, you test it, you validate it.

deliver.title: We Deliver
deliver.description: Testing, deployment, documentation. We deliver a system that works and that you know how to use. Not a prototype, a product.

ai-fit.question: Is AI right for my business?
ai-fit.answer: AI can bring benefits to almost any type of business. During the initial consultation, we analyze your specific context to identify where artificial intelligence can really make a difference: automating repetitive processes, data analysis, customer support, operations optimization. We don't propose pre-packaged solutions, but build a custom path together with you.

timeline.question: How long does an AI project take?
timeline.answer: Timing varies based on complexity. A proof-of-concept or MVP can be ready in 2-4 weeks. More complex projects require 2-3 months. We work with agile methodology, so you'll have visibility on progress and tangible results from the first weeks.

cost.question: How much does an AI consulting project cost?
cost.answer: Every project is different, so costs depend on complexity and objectives. We offer packages ranging from an initial strategic consultation to full solution development. After the free introductory call, we always prepare a detailed and transparent quote.

process.question: How does the work process work?
process.answer: Everything starts with a free introductory call where we listen to your needs. Then we analyze the context, propose a solution and, if we decide to proceed, we work together with agile methodology: weekly sprints, continuous feedback and regular demos to ensure the result is exactly what you need.
